TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ControlSkinDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ControlSkinDelegate(control As Control) As Control
type ControlSkinDelegate = delegate of Control -> Control

param.name: control
param.span: 要套用此佈景主題面板的 。

span.span: The to which to apply the theme skin.

summary.span: 代表將正確的控制面板套用到指定控制項的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that applies the correct control skin to the specified control.

returns.span: 傳遞給此方法且已套用控制面板的 。

span.span: The that was passed to the method, with a control skin applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用頁面和控制項的開發人員， ，或直接類別。Page and control developers do not use the , , or classes directly. 這些類別可在內部由 ASP.NET 網頁架構適用於伺服器端屬性和 ASP.NET 佈景主題和控制面板檔案，以特定類型的控制項中所定義的階層式樣式表定義。These classes are used internally by the ASP.NET page framework to apply server- side properties and cascading style sheet definitions that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skin files to specific types of controls. 委派相關聯方法類別。The delegate is associated with the method of the class. ASP.NET 控制面板，也就是 ASP.NET 佈景主題的一個元件所代表的類別代表物件。The class represents an ASP.NET control skin, which is a component of an ASP.NET theme represented by a object. 如需有關 ASP.NET 佈景主題的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information about ASP.NET themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
